about_the_game:
Get to play the first chapter of Word To Angel early through this demo!

This demo will stay available until the full game releases.

  • Experience a musical pacifist adventure much more focused on emotions and characters rather than fighting and action. (Beware of the "friendly-looking angels", nonetheless!)

  • Get to listen to a rich soundtrack and play exciting music-themed mini games, turn-based bosses and more! (Some of them are really challenging.)

  • Explore the first environment (Paris) and get to save it then the rest of the world in the full game through an original story and deep lore with glimpses of humor! (I've heard the dads and moms' stories are neat...)

  • No one gets hurt. You'll have to use something other than violence in order to solve conflicts. (Maybe use your brain? Or your heart?)

  • Choices matter! Whenever a decision is presented to you, choose carefully! It may impact the story and how other characters feel about you. (It may also impact how you feel about yourself, huh.)

  • Promote nature and animal protection everywhere. Even if you gotta fight for it! (*ahem* Fighting as defending it. Never forget about the fourth feature. NEVER.)

  • You can feed pigeons.

                                       

  • Explore, talk to NPCs and find gems in overworld then trade them for delicious healthy snacks which you can later use to brighten your mood up during fights.

  • You can also trade gems for gears that could provide nice advantage facing bosses.

  • Work your way into boss fights peacefully by using your words. You should be able to convince and change their mind if you choose the correct ones.

  • Some angels aren't much up for conversations! They will let you know by attacking. Don't get hit too much or you might run out of motivation to continue.

  • MIP stands for Mind Points and MOP stands for Mood Points. These work like the HP of the player and the boss.

In Chapter 1, you play as Meherio! Meet and play as all other characters later in the full game!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: x86_32 CPU with SSE2 instructions, x86_64 CPU, ARMv8 CPU
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics with full Vulkan 1.0 support
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: x86_64 CPU with SSE4.2 instructions, with 4 physical cores or more, ARMv8 CPU
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics with full Vulkan 1.2 support
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Play as Meherio in the introduction chapter of this musical pacifist RPG taking place in an alternative version of the world where some friendly angels and a very shy god conduct balance and harmony together.
